name: [Aiolos]
description:
Use keyboard and mouse to navigate the start menu and it is highly recommended to use controller for actual gameplay.

L1 & L2 or Q & E to Switch Jackets

X or SPACE to Jump or Hold to glide

SHIFT & L2 to Dash.

Circle or Left Click to activate Blizzard Cloak Ability if in radius of asteroid while wearing the Blizzard Cloak.
